value.title: Chip Mode
value.description: 0 Configuration Mode, 1 Readout Triggered Mode, 2 Readout Continuous Mode

value.title: Start Memory Self Test
value.description: (Only if Chip Mode is 0). Reset automatically after 1 clock cycle. Memory status is written on bit 1 of Region Readout Status Register

value.title: Xoff
value.description: 0 DMU Enabled, 1 DMU Disabled - Datasending is paused

value.title: Force Busy
value.description: 0 disabled, 1 BUSY line forced to the value specified in Force Busy Value bit

value.title: Force Busy Value
value.description: Logical value forced in BUSY line when Force Busy is asserted

value.title: Pixel MEB Mask
value.description: 1:disable given event buffer (default 000 to enable all meb slices) Setting Bit0 masks Matrix slice 1, bit1 masks slice2 and bit2 masks slice3

value.title: Internal STROBE generation
value.description: 0: disabled, 1:enable generation of a repetitive strobe pulse in continuous mode.

value.title: Enable BUSY Monitoring
value.description: 0: disabled, 1:FROMU will monitor external BUSY line, and reject triggers when BUSY is asserted (default)

value.title: Test Pulse Mode
value.description: 0: digital pulse to pixels(default), 1:set analog pulse as a test pulse

value.title: Enable Test STROBE
value.description: 0: digital pulse to pixels(default), 1: set analog pulse as a test pulse

value.title: STROBE signal duration
value.description: Set the duration of the STROBE signal from 0 to 1638.4us (step 25ns)

address.title: DAC settings for CMU I/O buffers
Base 3 - Column Disable Register
address.description: Column Disable Register for selected region

value.title: Pixel row select address
value.description: Selects the row of pixels needs to be addressed, i.e. for which row the CFG_ROWSEL line will be asserted

value.title: All Pixel row selected
value.description: If set to one the row address field [8:0] is ignored and all rows are enabled simultaneously for configuration.

value.title: PIXCNFG_REGSEL
value.description: Selection of the in-pixel register to be addressed: 0 for the Pulse Enable register, 1 for the Mask register.

value.title: PIXCNFG_DATA
value.description: Data to be written in the target register

value.title: Pixel column select address
value.description: Selects which column of pixels needs to be addressed, i.e. for which column the CFG_COLSEL line is asserted.

value.title: All Pixel column selected
value.description: If set to one the column address field [9:0] is ignored and all columns are enabled simultaneously for configuration.

value.title: Pixel CFG Register 3
value.description: Setting the bit 0 to 1 will enable the propagation of the row and column signals to the matrix. When bit is set, a subsequent write to this register will reset the bit and disable the row and column selection, regardless of the value being written.

value.title: SWCNTL_DACMONI
value.description: Configures the DAC block to enable the overrinding of the selected DAC. 0: for monitoring, 1: for overriding

value.title: SWCNTL_DACMONV
value.description: Configures the DAC block to enable the overrinding of the selected DAC. 0: for monitoring, 1: for overriding
